refnamediv.refpurpose: Parameter entities which define the DocBook classes

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.para: Classes group elements of a similar type, for example all the lists are in the list.class
If you want to add a new kind of something (a new kind of list or a new kind of verbatim environment, for example), you generally want to add the name of the new element to the appropriate class.
